text: Not sure if this would interest anyone (maybe <@U026PLK4S> ?), but design contests can be fun: <http://www.ign.com/articles/2014/09/11/call-of-duty-perk-design-contest>

attachments.title: Call of Duty Perk Design Contest - IGN
attachments.text: Think you can design the best perk? Show us what you got and you could win the Atlas Edition of Advanced Warfare.
attachments.fallback: IGN: Call of Duty Perk Design Contest - IGN
